meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Connie McClung Michael Brown Megan Barnes Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6114.

td.p: Connie McClung, a human resources and finance manager from Atlanta, Georgia
Michael Brown, a graduate student from Rochester, New York
Megan Barnes, a stay-at-home mother from Baltimore, Maryland (whose 2-day cash winnings total $70,002)

tr.td: A FAIR TO REMEMBER
THE GENTLE ART OF RUGBY
RUSSIAN FOOD & DRINK
WHAT THE HECK IS THAT CRITTER?
THE MANSION FAMILY
DOUBLE LETTER, DOUBLE MEANING

Megan
')
